mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_upload_file ( file_type, file_name, file_path, upload_time, opt_user ) VALUES( #{uploadFile.fileType}, #{uploadFile.fileName}, #{uploadFile.filePath}, #{uploadFile.uploadTime}, #{uploadFile.optUser} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_upload_file WHERE file_type = #{fileType} AND file_name = #{fileName}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT tuf.file_id, tuf.file_type, tuf.file_name, tuf.file_path, DATE_FORMAT(tuf.upload_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS upload_time, tuf.opt_user, tuf.opt_time FROM tbl_upload_file tuf WHERE tuf.file_id = #{fileId} LIMIT 0,1
